SELECT DAYIARY_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_INFO ( PRODUCT_SEQ, P_NAME, SELLER_ID, P_PRICE, P_CONTENT, REG_DATE, STATUS, PRODUCT_CATEGORY ) VALUES ( 'P'||TRIM(TO_CHAR(#{productSeq}, '999999999999')), #{pName}, #{sellerId}, #{pPrice}, #{pContent}, SYSDATE, 'Y', #{productCategory} )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(A.PRODUCT_SEQ) AS CNT FROM PRODUCT_INFO A, PRODUCT_FILE B WHERE B.FILE_SEQ = 1 AND A.PRODUCT_SEQ = B.PRODUCT_SEQ
AND A.PRODUCT_CATEGORY = #{productType}
AND A.P_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND A.P_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'

SELECT A.PRODUCT_SEQ, NVL(A.P_NAME,'') AS P_NAME, NVL(A.SELLER_ID,'') AS SELLER_ID, NVL(A.P_PRICE,'') AS P_PRICE, NVL(A.P_CONTENT,'') AS P_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS REG_DATE, NVL(A.STATUS,'') AS STATUS, NVL(A.PRODUCT_CATEGORY,'') AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY, NVL(B.FILE_NAME,'') AS FILE_NAME, NVL(B.FILE_SEQ,1) AS FILE_SEQ FROM PRODUCT_INFO A INNER JOIN PRODUCT_FILE B ON A.PRODUCT_SEQ = B.PRODUCT_SEQ WHERE B.FILE_SEQ = 1 AND A.PRODUCT_SEQ = #{value}
SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, NVL(FILE_NAME, '') AS FILE_NAME FROM PRODUCT_FILE WHERE PRODUCT_SEQ = #{value} AND FILE_SEQ = 2
SELECT COUNT(USER_ID) FROM FAVORITE_LIST WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PRODUCT_SEQ = #{productSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITE_LIST ( USER_ID, R_SEQ, PRODUCT_SEQ, REG_DATE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, null, #{productSeq}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_SEQ AS PRODUCT_SEQ, P.P_NAME AS P_NAME, P.P_PRICE AS P_PRICE, P.P_CONTENT AS P_CONTENT, PF.FILE_NAME AS FILE_NAME FROM PRODUCT_INFO P, FAVORITE_LIST F, PRODUCT_FILE PF WHERE F.USER_ID = #{value} AND F.PRODUCT_SEQ IS NOT NULL AND P.PRODUCT_SEQ = F.PRODUCT_SEQ AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND PF.FILE_SEQ = 1 AND PF.PRODUCT_SEQ = F.PRODUCT_SEQ ORDER BY F.REG_DATE DESC
